phrases: I-I cleaned it, do not worry.
Sawako-chan, what happened with Kazehaya earlier?
I just thought that I like him.
Are you going to go out with him?
Did you tell him that you like him?
You are not going out with him?
Who knows what could have happened in that situation.
You might have said yes” in the heat of the moment.
Kurumi-chan, do you think it is possible for Kazehaya-kun to fall for me?
I did not even have anyone to talk to until just recently.
Kazehaya does not care about that sort of thing.
He is nice, and he is caring,
and he makes his own judgments.
When he smiles, you feel relieved and smile back.
And he gets angry when he needs to.
He is sort of short-tempered, and he hates anything that is wrong.
He is popular with both the guys and girls.
Why am I here with you?
This is the first time I have talked to anyone like this.
Kurumi-chan accepts me for who I am, even after everything she said.
We are in high school, and everyone is cheering me on.
I could have made him notice me.
But now it is too late.
Kazehaya-kun thinks I like Arai Pin.
Anything I say, he is only going to think I am saying it because I am embarrassed.
I have always known that Kazehaya does not think anything special of me.
It does not matter anymore, whether he finds out or gets the wrong idea...
I did not want Kazehaya-kun to think I like Sanada-kun.
He will understand if you tell him.
You think he will understand if I tell him the truth?
I still would not like it.
We both feel the same way about the same person.
Yet we cannot be friends, even though we have the same feelings.
Then what will that make us, Kurumi-chan?
Will we be nothing at all?
Or will we be something else?
You scared me, disappearing all of a sudden.
I will be at the game tomorrow.
I am hungry, are not you?
Kurumi-chan, let us be in the same group.
There is no one you like?
I am glad I am friends with Kurumi.
We are in the same group, yay.
But Miki has always liked him.
Kurumi lent Miyagawa her notes and stuff.
She does not like it when a guy likes any girl besides herself.
That is why she acts as if she likes them.
Kurumi my ass, her name's Ume.
We let her in our group so we could talk to guys.
Let us get in her way if she ever starts to like someone.
She got in our way already, right?
Have you been a little bummed lately?
I do not want to do club work in the rain.
Yeah, I just came to pick something up.
Here it is, I knew it.
He is always with the guys.
We are in the same class.
He sees me for who I am.
So you do not care if Kazehaya finds out?
What a bitch, acting all nice.
But she always speaks the truth, even when it is risky.
So when Kuronuma says something, I believe her.
I do not think she agrees,
but if she always played it safe, Yoshida and Yano might not have trusted her either.
As much as you want to help her, she always does it by herself.
I think she really worked hard.
He will understand if you tell him.
What the hell am I saying?
If Kazehaya got the wrong idea...
I do not want him to.
I have always been watching you.
Please do not think I like someone else.
I cannot make myself think of anyone else more than her.
Are you at least a little happy that I confessed to you?
Call me by my first name, just once.
I guess this old-ass name is not so bad.
Geez, I was not going to tell you.
I totally screwed up my calculations.
It was you that made me screw up the most.
You are never going to meet anyone as cute as I am.
And why would I like that dumbass Pin?
You do not have a good eye for women, do you?
I wonder if we might have understood each other better if Kurumi-chan and I had liked two different people.
Why are you acting like you did not know?
Hey, what made you realize you like him?
But if she had liked someone else, I might not have known.
I cannot believe how aggressive she is when it comes to guys.
I admire her in a sense.
Anyway, that is good news, Sawako.
Things are going to get a lot more fun.
I am glad I said it.
I am glad I could tell Kurumi-chan too.
And I was glad when she told me.
What is up with those shades?
Hey, you, what is up with those sunglasses?
You are that kid that likes me.
What, did you cry yourself out of it?
Like someone your own age next time.
With high school kids, you tell them that you like them, and they will be thinking about you all day.
I am going to win the rest of the soccer games.
I am going to win and party like hell.
I was happy when I fell for him too.
I never said anything when people said nice things about him.
I never told anyone how much I liked him.
I always kept it to myself.
If by any crazy fluke things work out between you two,
I am never going to congratulate you.
I hate any woman that Kazehaya likes.
We cannot be friends, can we?
I know, I was pissed too.
I might have liked her if she would always been like that.
Okay, let us head home and party at six.
I went home and looked it up in the dictionary.
So, since when have you liked him?
What about since his public confession?
Nah, I doubt it, not yet.
I think I had feelings for him by then.
I wonder when I started feeling like this.
Kazehaya, what are you singing next?
She said she went outside because her face got red.
Gee, who made her get red?
My world had changed that moment.
I would fallen in love the moment he called my name.
